text: Parameter Description Fundamental parameters s=r Number of sets E Number of lines per set B=2 Block size (bytes) m=logy(M) Number of physical (main memory) address bits Derived quantities M=2" Maximum number of unique memory addresses s =logx5) Number of set index bits b =logy(B) Number of block offset bits t=m-(s+b) Number of tag bits C=BxEx5 Cachesize (bytes), not including overhead such as the valid and tag bits Figure 6.26 Summary of cache parameters.
